alert.note: Alert for Clark; Hot Spring; Pike (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 6:15PM CDT until June 13 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Clark County in southwestern Arkansas... Central Pike County in southwestern Arkansas... West central Hot Spring County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 615 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Center Point, or near Dierks, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Arkadelphia... Murfreesboro... Amity... Caddo Valley... Daisy... Narrows Dam... DeGray Lake State Park... Crater Of Diamonds State Park... Daisy State Park... Bismarck... Alpine... Bear Creek Public Use Area... Lower Lake Recreation Area... Shawmut... Rosboro... Pike City... Nathan... Point Cedar... Kirby... Highland in Pike County... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
